  • Method Details

    • chekPosition

      protected static void chekPosition​(char x, byte y) throws OutOfBoardException, TakenPositionException
      Method to check coordinates (coords) for legality
      Parameters:
      x - column of turn as char
      y - row of turn as int
      Throws:
      OutOfBoardException - when coords are out of board
      TakenPositionException - when there is figure on position of coords
